mapper.sql: select * from umpay.T_COUPON_FTPFILE where 1 = 1 #if( $merId && $merId!='' ) and merId = :merId #end #if( $fileType && $fileType!='' ) and fileType = :fileType #end #if( $fileState && $fileState!='' ) and fileState = :fileState #end #if( $startDate && $startDate!='' ) and statDate >= :startDate #end #if( $endDate && $endDate!='' ) and statDate <= :endDate #end order by inTime desc
